thread.title: Argentines brace for crisis as nation again seeks IMF help

title: Argentines brace for crisis as nation again seeks IMF help
text:
Argentines brace for crisis as nation again seeks IMF help 01:49
Soaring interest rates and a plunging currency have left many Argentines bracing for an economic crisis. As Ciara Lee reports, it comes just weeks after a sombre President Macri announced in a televised speech that Argentina would start talks with the IMF for a credit line worth at least $19.7 billion.
